TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l eɪ s k ɑːɹ s t æ l ɚ æ s h ɜː t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð iː z ɪ k t ɪ ŋ z w ɪ ð h ɚ f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t ɔːɹ s ɪ k s b uː n z ʌ v ɹ æ z s n oʊ p iː z f aɪ v s ɪ k s l æ b z ʌ v l tʃ z æ n d m eɪ b iː ɐ s n æ ɡ f ɔːɹ h ɐ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɔː w ɪ ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ ɡ t ɔː f ɹ ɑː ɡ f ɔːɹ ð ə k eɪ s ʃ iː k æ n s ɡ oʊ s ɡ uː p ð iː s t ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ʊ θ ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d b æ ɡ z æ n d w ɪ w ɪ ɡ oʊ m iː d h ɚ w ɛ n s t eɪ æ t ð ə t eɪ ɪ ŋ s t eɪ ʃ ə n
